column2: Latest;Phnom Penh: A ------robber who broke through a locked door and stole a foreigner’s property was arrested at 18:00 on November 2
column18: the victim closed and locked the door and went to bed at his home near  Kandal Market. On the morning of October 28
column23: and discovered there were missing goods in the shop
column24: and filed a complaint at the Central Police Station.------After receiving a police force complaint
column25: the 2nd Central Police Station cooperated with the justice force of the Daun Penh Police Inspectorate to investigate and arrested  the suspect.------A passport
column29: bank card and two computers were returned------Another computer
column33: and six white iPhone 6 phones are still missing.------The suspects was sent to the Phnom Penh Municipal Court.------https://tvfb.news/article/15711
